text: The jurors selected and impaneled, as provided by section 16-1357, shall take an oath or affirmation, administered by the court, that they:
historical:
Prior Codifications

1981 Ed., ยง 16-1358.

1973 Ed., ยง 16-1358.

DC CODE ยง 16-1358

Current through December 11, 2012

sections.text: are not interested in any manner in the property to be condemned;
are not, to their knowledge, related to any person interested in the property; and
will, impartially and to the best of their judgment, ascertain, appraise, and award just compensation for the property to be condemned and taken in the proceeding.

title.text: Particular Actions, Proceedings and Matters. (Refs & Annos)

subchapter.text: Real Property for United States. (Refs & Annos)
